title: MS Office 2013 SP1 Pro Plus+Visio Pro+Project Pro 15.0.4-AppzDam
description:
For more info visit : appzdam.net

What's new :

Opening Microsoft Office, you will immediately notice the new and fresh design. However, all of the old and familiar features have not disappeared and were supplemented by new ones, which help to work more efficiently. New Office applications can also be used on smartphones, tablet PCs and cloud environments, even on computers without a specific set of Office. Now the important files will always be available to you, wherever you are and whatever device or used.
Using Office from any location
Install Office by using the account Microsoft.
Use Office program on another computer.
Save files to SkyDrive for easy access and sharing.
Use your personal way to configure, no matter where you are.
Saving files and share them in the cloud. Cloud storage is available at any time when connected to the Internet. Now you can easily save Office files on SkyDrive or on the organization's website, where you can work with documents Word, Excel spreadsheets and other Office files and make them available to other users. You can even work on a file simultaneously with others.
Joint Meeting. Join online meeting and use the slide PowerPoint, documents Word, Excel spreadsheets and OneNote notes together.
Meeting participants can view the files, even if they have not installed a set of Office.
More options started. Instead of an empty file, you can select the last file or favorite template. OneNote allows you to enter and discover the notebooks from the Internet or from a PC.
Easier saving and opening. You no longer need a long view and scroll through the dialog boxes. His most used folders, you will see at once. You can also fix the location that it was always available.
Simplified file sharing. All parameters file sharing collected in Office programs in one place, which can be opened by selecting the File tab click Sharing.

Notes :

The assembly is the original installer Microsoft Office 2013 with built-in updates in three languages Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹(English, Russian, Ukrainian) and additional utilities that can both facilitate the installation and configure it to the last detail.

General information:
Languages: English, Russian, Ukrainian Activation: KMSAuto Lite from Ratiborus Extras: Office Tab - switching between files using tabs (like a browser)



Silent installation is performed using file .msp (folder MSP) and, if necessary, you can customize them to your taste by using the OCT. Details of the use of the OCT can be found at the following link: technet.microsoft.com/ru-ru/library/cc179097.aspx At the time of installation is recommended to disable antivirus solutions - a process will take place more quickly and the probability of successful activation is much increased.




Options silent install * (used AutorunHelper.exe):
/ O86U - silent installation of Office (x86) with updates
/ O64U - silent installation of Office (x64) with updates
/ O86N - silent installation of Office (x86) without updates
/ O64N - silent installation of Office (x64) without updates / V86U - silent installation of Visio (x86) with updates / V64U - silent installation of Visio (x64) with updates / V86N - silent installation of Visio (x86) without updates / V64N - silent installation of Visio (x64) without updates / P86U - silent installation Project (x86) with updates / P64U - silent installation Project (x64) with updates / P86N - silent installation Project (x86) without updates / P64N - silent installation Project (x64) without updates / UP2013 - install updates / KMS - Activation / TAB - installation of Office Tab / S - hide the progress window For example, the team AutorunHelper.exe / O86U / V86N / KMS / TAB install Office x86 with updates, Visio x86 without updates, activate both the product and install Office Tab. For unpacked version (.exe Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ 2.5-3 GB) the same the launch is as follows: Install.exe -y -nr gm2 "% TEMP%  OFFICE2013  AutorunHelper.exe" / O86U / V86N / KMS / TAB


File name Install.exe need to be replaced by a corresponding.
* Do not install the products of different bit simultaneously (Office x64 Visio and x86 )
